title: Place Spawning Pits (D)
text: Place the Soul and Monster spawning pits on the indicated hexes on the battlefield map. Place Monsters as indicated by the scenario. If a scenario indicates the use of a random Monster spawning pit, then place an appropriate random Monster from your collection on that pit. Souls do not start on the map and will begin spawning in round 2. (Learn more in the 'Monsters & Souls' section pg.70.)
